com.PersonalBlog.services

Class PostService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.PersonalBlog.services.PostService

  • @RestController
public class PostService
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all restful services Posts.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity createPost(@Valid com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode objectNode)
      This method creates a post based on the data sent through the frontend.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity deletePost(@Valid com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode objectNode)
      This parameter deletes a post based on its id.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity editPost(@Valid com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode objectNode)
      This method edits a post based on the data provided on the frontend.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getAllPosts(int limit, int page)
      This method takes a number "limit" and a number "pages" to get all post that will be displayed per page.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getPostById(java.lang.Long id)
      This method get a post based on its id from the database.
